SEARCH
Package game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
graphics.Coloured, graphics.Drawable
public class Player extends Object implements graphics.Drawable, graphics.Coloured
Class used to represent the player and the ally base, used to buy towers and physically placed at the center of the base as the enemies' target
